The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Tuesday 

Cream Vegetable Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (carrot, zucchini, celery, white onion, potato, tomato, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Tofu, Mushrooms & Polenta– vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 400 g (champinion mushrooms, carrot, red bell pepper, celery, white onion, tofu, polenta, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Hemp seeds & Tomato Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (white onion, millet, tomato, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Pistachio & Cocoa Truffle – raw / gluten free / 30 g (cocoa butter, cashew, pistachio, fresh cocoa powder,vanilla, tahina, unfiltered honey)

Lemon & Coconut Truffle – raw / gluten free / 30 g (cocoa butter, cashew, lemon, coconut, vanilla, unfiltered honey)

Cocoa & Coffee Truffle – raw / gluten free / 30 g (cocoa butter, cashew, coffee, fresh cocoa powder, vanilla, tahina, unfiltered honey)
